name: Prince of Persia Trilogy Limited Edition
summary: This collection includes all three of the famous action-adventure game Prince of Persia: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time, Prince of Persia: Warrior Within, Prince of Persia: The Two Thrones. If you want to get acquainted with all the exciting adventures of a nameless prince of Babylon to the Island of Time, this trilogy is for you!
